members.name: actions
members.description: Actions

members.name: addable
members.description: Show the new event button

members.name: administrators
members.description: NetSuite Users in any of these roles are considered Mobile Administrators allowing them to generate mobile invites for other users and to login as another Mobile User. Roles with Field Service Mobile check will show here by default.

members.name: asset
members.description: Resource that presents information about the Asset or one of its child assets.

members.name: consumables
members.description: Resource that allows the user to consume inventory from their warehouse.

parameters.name: options.asset
parameters.description: Internalid of child asset to consume part against.

members.name: contact
members.description: Contact

members.name: details
members.description: Details Resource.

members.name: event
members.description: Events to load for the current User. This can be configured to source different record types but by default only CRM Tasks are shown.

properties.name: event.record
properties.description: Record type

properties.name: event.filters
properties.description: Search filters to apply to the record type

properties.name: event.map
properties.description: Field map of search columns and fields. These attributes will be available in definitions for Resources and Articles.

properties.name: event.map.id
properties.description: Must include an id attribute who's value will be in the pattern of "{modelid}-{internalid}".

properties.name: event.map.label
properties.description: Label for the event.

properties.name: event.map.sublabel
properties.description: Sublabel for the event.

properties.name: event.map.startdate
properties.description: Start date time stamp for the event.

properties.name: event.map.enddate
properties.description: End date time stamp for the event.

properties.name: event.map.address
properties.description: Address of the event in Google Api friendly format.

properties.name: event.map.latitude
properties.description: Latitude of the event.

properties.name: event.map.longitude
properties.description: Longitude of the event.

properties.name: event.map.timezone
properties.description: Timezone of the event in NetSuite compatible Olsom values. Requests for the Event, it's Resources, and its Articles will be run in this timezone.

properties.name: event.resources
properties.description: Set of rules to lookup which Resources to load for the user. Properties added to the rules will filter the attribute on the user.

properties.name: event.resources[].resources
properties.description: Resource ids to load for the containing rule.

members.name: expenses
members.description: Expenses

members.name: files
members.description: Resource that allows the user to upload and attach files to the current task.

parameters.name: options.asset
parameters.description: Internalid of child asset to associate the file with.

members.name: history
members.description: Resource that shows the service history for the event Asset or one of its child assets.

parameters.name: options.asset
parameters.description: Internalid of child asset to show history for.

members.name: imagesize
members.description: Default maximum dimensions of images uploaded from file inputs

members.name: import
members.description: JavaScript, JSON, and CSS file paths to append to the head of the document. These files are cached for offline useage and will trigger an update and redownload all files when any import id changes. JSON files are loaded as a JavaScript global named after the import id.

members.name: inject
members.description: Optional HTML to append to the head of the document. Useful for adding styles and scripts for customization.

members.name: inventory
members.description: Inventory Resource to load datalists of items that can be used on Task Resources. The configured but unprocessed JSON for these Resources can be accessed in the Mobile suitelet by navigating the Mobile to the url mobile/task.

parameters.name: options.location
parameters.description: Location internalid or array of locations internalids to load inventory from.

properties.name: consumable
properties.description: Datalist element of consumable items available in the Users location.

properties.name: consumable.options
properties.description: Object to resolve into array of options. Sorts on the label property.

properties.name: consumable.options.group
properties.description: Item Groups.

properties.name: consumable.options.location
properties.description: Non Serialized, Non Bin, Non Lot Numbered inventory when Inventory Locations is disabled.

properties.name: consumable.options.inventorylocation
properties.description: Non Serialized, Non Bin, Non Lot inventory when Inventory Locations is enabled.

properties.name: consumable.options.inventorynumber
properties.description: Serialized or Lot Numbered inventory.

properties.name: consumable.options.inventorynumberbinonhand
properties.description: Bin Numbered, Serialized, or Lot Numbered inventory when Advanced Inventory enabled.

properties.name: consumable.options.binnumber
properties.description: Bin Numbered, Non Serialized, Non Lot Numbered inventory when Advanced Inventory disabled.

properties.name: consumable.options.binonhand
properties.description: Bin Numbered, Non Serialized, Non Lot Numbered inventory when Advanced Inventory enabled.

properties.name: orderable
properties.description: Datalist element of orderable and quotable items.

properties.name: orderable.options
properties.description: Object to resolve into array of options. Sorts on the label property.

properties.name: orderable.options.location
properties.description: Quotable and Orderable items

members.name: notes
members.description: Resource that allows the user to create notes against the current event.

parameters.name: options.asset
parameters.description: Internalid of child asset to create the note against.

members.name: onsite
members.description: Distance in kilometers that a Resource is considered on site for an Event.

members.name: order
members.description: Order disabled when the order is pending receipt

members.name: quote
members.description: Quotes

members.name: receive
members.description: Receive No bin selection

members.name: return
members.description: Return Transfer orders transfering from the user location

members.name: salesorder
members.description:
Sales Order resource allows users to view or edit Sales Orders in the field. Default configuration shows the first Sales Order found on the current project. Item group header and footer lines and those not created from this task on the mobile are readonly. Lines that are added or edited from the current task that are fulfillable will automatically be fulfilled on save.

Known Issues
  • Deleting sales order lines in or above item groups will cause a syncing error.
  • Multiple users concurrently editing the Sales Order could overwrite changes.
  • Accounts with basic inventory will fulfill Bin items but not show on the Sales Order line.
  • Maximum quantity not enforced based on item availability at selected location. This could put the item in backorder or cause a syncing error with inventory detail.
  • Doesnt show tax or shipping line.
  • Does not apply billing rule logic.

members.name: times
members.description: Resource that allows the user to log time.

parameters.name: options.asset
parameters.description: Internalid of child asset to log time against.

members.name: user
members.description: Records in NetSuite that are considered Mobile Users. This is a hash of Model definitions that relate a user to a record. Any model properties or functions can be defined including the sync function.

properties.name: record
properties.description: Record type

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Search filters to apply to the record type

properties.name: map
properties.description: Field map of search columns and fields. These attributes will be available in definitions for resources using the template tag {user.*}. They are also used to match on resource rule lookups.

properties.name: map.id
properties.description: Must be in the pattern of "{recordtype}-{internalid}".

properties.name: map.label
properties.description: Name to show for the User

properties.name: map.email
properties.description: Email address to identify the User for Authentication

properties.name: map.password
properties.description: Encrypted password to use for Authentication when the User does not have NetSuite access.

properties.name: map.latitude
properties.description: Latitude of the user.

properties.name: map.longitude
properties.description: Longitude of the user.

properties.name: map.language
properties.description: Language preference for the User in NetSuite format language values. Requests for the User, Event, it's Resources, and its Articles will be run in this timezone.

properties.name: map.*
properties.description: Optional additional attributes can be added to make available for resource lookups and variables

properties.name: resources
properties.description: Set of rules to lookup which Resources to load for the user. Properties added to the rules will filter the attribute on the user.

properties.name: resources[].resources
properties.description: Resource ids to load for the containing rule.
